page.title: 10My Life Today age 7years
page.content: My life today is not a hard life.My Mummy does the cooking at home while my Daddy goes to work at his Office in London.Sometimes he works at home.He is a Salesman for Washing Powder.I have a brother,Duncan.He is five years old and I am seven.We both go to Harpsden School.We live in Henley.Duncan likes cycling and I like running,reading and writing.At School we have to do lots of work.I like Maths,Art,Games and Projects.I play the Recorder,write in joined-up Italic Writing and I can swim well. We come to School by car at 08.40 and School starts at 09.00.Morning play is at 10.30 and Dinner is at 12.00 in the Village Hall opposite.Play is at 12.30 in the playground or in the field if the weather is good.School ends at 15.00.After School we can play in the field.We have many outings at School.
